author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Heavy rain, strong winds pummel South Florida - WSVN 7News | Miami News, Weather, Sports
text: South Florida is experiencing severe weather on Friday as heavy rain and gusty winds rumble through parts of Miami-Dade. 7News stormtracker shows spinning arrows indicating the potential for funnel clouds that is starting to form from the Miami-Dade county line all the way into deep southern Miami-Dade.Miami-Dade Fire Rescue is urging drivers to remain off the roads due to the severe weather.
